name: Catch The Cure
description:
This game was made in 21 hours for the 2017 Make-a-thing Jam.

Keywords:
Vermillion
Remedy
Parallel

Play as two plague doctors, competing over who can catch the most remedies before getting infested themselves! Dodge the rats crawling down the buildings to stay alive for as long as you can!

Movement
Player 1 (black): A & D
Player 2 (White): Arrow keys

Thanks to Asbjorn Thirslund for help with the Screenshake script

Update 1.1
Added MAC Build (strangely it wouldn't let me rename it to CatchtheCure, so it's the MakeAThing2017_Mac.zip Download)
